member.name: M:Cadru.ApiClient.Extensions.ModelSerializationExtensions.ToKeyValuePairs(System.Object,System.Text.Json.JsonSerializerOptions)
member.summary: Converts the value of a type to a collection of .
member.param: The options to control serialization behavior.
member.returns: A collection of instances which represent the value.

remarks.para: The value is first serialized to a JSON string, which is then recursively parsed to create the key/value pairs.
Nested objects are defined using keys which show their hierarchy in dot (".") notation, and collections are shown using an indexed notation.
